channel.title: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra 1963
channel.description:
This series presents performances by the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra from its 1963 season.,Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra audition tape, recorded at 1963 rehearsal with permission of Musicians' Association, not for broadcast.,This series presents performances by the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra, conducted by Max Rudolf.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Audition tape
item.description: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra audition tape, recorded at 1963 rehearsal with permission of Musicians' Association, not for broadcast. This program contains portions of Kodaly Symphony and last movement of Beethoven Concerto No. 1.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Donizetti and Ravel
item.description: Roberta Peters performs a piece by Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Ravel.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Mozart, Delius, Verdi, and Donizetti
item.description: Roberta Peters performs pieces by Mozart, Verdi and Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Delius.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Mozart, Delius, Verdi, and Donizetti
item.description: Roberta Peters performs pieces by Mozart, Verdi and Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Delius.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Smetana and Schumann
item.description: This program features performances of pieces by Bedrich Smetana and Robert Schumann.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Tchaikovsky
item.description: This program features a performance of a piece by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Beethoven and Foss
item.description: This program features performances of pieces by Ludwig van Beethoven and Lukas Foss.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Schumann and Mozart
item.description: This program features performances of pieces by Robert Schumann and Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Symphonic concert
item.description: The program presents the performance of an unidentified piece by the Cincinnati Symphony.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of four parts, features performances of pieces by Weber, Creston, Ravel, and Rachmaninoff.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Stravinsky
item.description: This program features a performance of Igor Stravinsky's "Rites Of Spring."
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Weber, Takacs, and Berlioz
item.description: This program features performances of pieces by Carl Maria von Weber, Jeno Takacs, and Hector Berlioz.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Symphonic concert
item.description: The program presents the performance of an unidentified piece by the Cincinnati Symphony.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Mozart
item.description: Roberta Peters performs a piece by Mozart.
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras

item.title: Foss and Stravinsky
item.description: This program features Lukas Foss speaking, as well as a performance of Igor Stravinsky's "Rites Of Spring."
item.dc:creator: WGUC (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio)
item.dc:subject: Symphony orchestras
